{{Infobox battle item |name = Leek |image = [[File:Leek.png]] |caption = In-game image of the ''Leek''. |location =
[[Galar#Routes|Galar Route 5]] }} == Description == The '''Leek''' is a type of held item that can only be equipped to Farfetch'd, Galarian Farfetch'd and Sirfetch'd. == Details == Raises attack of the Pokémon holding the item by 20%. == Acquisition == {{ItemPrice/head‎|Evolution items}} {{ItemPrice|[[Galar#Routes|Galar Route 5]]|[[Rare_Hold_Items|Rare Hold Item]] drop from Galarian Farfetch'd ''(Base 1/512 chance to drop)*''}} |} |} *Note: Using the [[Dowsing Machine]] increases the chances of obtaining Leek to 1/341.

==Uses== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pre-Evolution !! Evolution |- | [[File:Galarian Farfetch'd.png|40px]] Galarian Farfetch'd || [[File:Sirfetch'd.png|40px]] Sirfetch'd |} {{Held Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Held Items]]
